channel.title: Post your creations here
channel.description:
Well since Minecraft is built around constructing things, I figure'd we should have a thread where we can share our favorites of what we've created. I could put about a billion different pictures in here lol, but for now I'm just going to post a few pictures of my most recent work.
So this is an underwater greenhouse I made a week or two ago. Took ages to get the water out of the tunnels and what not since every block of water in the ocean is a source block. But it was worth it I like it =)
This is a view from atop my mountain/base:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jquNM.png[/img] You can see the tunnel that leads from my base area, to the greenhouse itself off in the distance.
This is the part of the tunnel that's underwater:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZcfkJ.png[/img]
Here's the greenhouse itself, no plants yet still experimenting with lighting:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cKR4V.png[/img]
And here's a look at it from just outside:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BnxkR.png[/img]
Oh and by the way all my stuff is built without the aide of any mods, inventory editors, and is done in survival mode with the difficulty on hard.

item.title: Post your creations here
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:376759”]Ff you made the building and left the water in, you did it the long way.
I made a underwater path way from 1 house of mine to another within a couple of hours. Not as big ofc but quite long.

All you need to do is get a lot of dirt, and place them for the size of the tunnel, then top it with glass or stone. Then just dig it all out and walla.[/quote]
I did use dirt. If I had used buckets it would have taken ages.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your creations here
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Ff you made the building and left the water in, you did it the long way.
I made a underwater path way from 1 house of mine to another within a couple of hours. Not as big ofc but quite long.

All you need to do is get a lot of dirt, and place them for the size of the tunnel, then top it with glass or stone. Then just dig it all out and walla.

Read full topic
